Text.Page:
One of our spies inside the Temple of Dagon reports seeing colorful stones called "stones of joy." She says they shine with five colors.

No idea why the nagas call 'em "stones of joy," what they're good for, or who made them in the first place.

But I do know this: you're gonna steal those iridescent nuggets.
Top men will figure out what these stones do. Top. Men.
Gathering the stones will annoy the nagas, but it's not a mission imperative. Just keep an eye out, will you?
